data.title: Battlefield 2042 credits (Windows, 2021)
data.meta_description: The official game credits for Battlefield 2042 released on Windows in 2021. The credits include 4,371 people.
data.text:
Battlefield 2042

#ONETEAM Made from home with passion by DICE, EA Gothenburg, Ripple Effect, and Criterion - working as #ONETEAM from all over the world, To our partners, families, and friends - Your unwavering support empowered us to build this game from home, during a global pandemic, For that we owe unlimited thanks Dedication Dedicated to the memories and contributions of our dear friends, Mikael Rudberg, Michael Kenneth Williams

ERG Groups

Thanks A huge thanks to our Employee Resources groups, we couldn't have done this without you.

BEAT!

BEAT! As a collective, BEAT which stands for Black EA Team, we envision a world where Black talent and Black leadership at EA are no longer underrepresented., A world where we attract and equip Black talent with the know-how, navigation, and network to realize their full potential and trigger a multiplier effect of influence and impact to benefit our organization. BEAT! Sweden Chairs/Leads Mark Kyobe, Pawit Pawar BEAT! Sweden Steering Viktoria Anselm, Mikael Eng, Alexis Holder, Nickole Li

PRIDE

PRIDE PRIDE is EA's LGBT2SQIA+* Employee Resource Group., We are committed to making real change at EA, and throughout the industry, by creating an environment where LGBT2SQIA+ employees can not only be accepted, but thrive, grow, and have their voices both heard and amplified. PRIDE Co-Chairs Mikael Eng, Alex Kilmpasanis Pride Comms Lead Viktoria Anselm Pride Ops Lead Pierre Autissier, Amanda Franell, Effeli Holst, Pawit Pawar, Vachon Pugh, Erin Sullivan

WUT

WUT The Women's Ultimate Team [WUT] is a group for all employees to work together on building more inclusive workplaces for everyone. We aim to positively influence our culture, business, players, and surrounding community by championing diversity and gender inclusion. WUT Sweden Chairs Jewell Morelli, Benoit Schotte-Daudin WUT Sweden Leads Viktoria Anselm, Effeli Holst, Linda Javidi, Ashley St. Germain, Erin Sullivan, Tove Svensson, Jessica Van Dyke
